versions.label: Introduced
versions.raw_html:
The following has special meaning:
green underline denotes added text
red struck out text denotes deleted text
2025 IL H 496
Author: Welch
Version: Introduced
Version Date: 01/08/2025

104TH GENERAL ASSEMBLY

State of Illinois

2025 and 2026

HB0496

Introduced, by Rep. Emanuel "Chris" Welch

SYNOPSIS AS INTRODUCED:

820 ILCS 42/1

Amends the Artificial Intelligence Video Interview Act. Makes a technical change in a Section concerning the short title.

A BILL FOR

AN ACT concerning employment.

Be it enacted by the People of the State of Illinois, represented in the General Assembly:

Section 5. The Artificial Intelligence Video Interview Act is amended by changing Section 1 as follows:

(820 ILCS 42/1)

Sec. 1. Short title. This Act may be cited as the the Artificial Intelligence Video Interview Act.

(Source: P.A. 101-260, eff. 1-1-20.)

Version: | Introduced  
Version Date: | 01/08/2025  
  
**104TH GENERAL ASSEMBLY**

**State of Illinois**

**2025 and 2026**

**HB0496**

Introduced, by Rep. Emanuel "Chris" Welch

**SYNOPSIS AS INTRODUCED:**

820 ILCS 42/1

Amends the Artificial Intelligence Video Interview Act. Makes a technical
change in a Section concerning the short title.

**A BILL FOR**

AN ACT concerning employment.

**Be it enacted by the People of the State of Illinois, represented in the
General Assembly:**

Section 5. The Artificial Intelligence Video Interview Act is amended by
changing Section 1 as follows:

(820 ILCS 42/1)

Sec. 1. Short title. This Act may be cited as _the_ ~~the~~ Artificial
Intelligence Video Interview Act.

(Source: P.A. 101-260, eff. 1-1-20.)
